nodes.text: Piar Nagelsa was a male Kerkoiden general in the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, when the CIS fought against the Galactic Republic for control of the galaxy from the years 22 BBY to 19 BBY. Shortly before the First Battle of Plagen, a T-series tactical droid killed Nagelsa due to issues most tactical droids had with serving under unfit organic leaders. It then discarded Nagelsa's tactical plan as it assumed command and led the CIS forces to win the battle.
Nagelsa was mentioned in 2012's The Essential Guide to Warfare, an extensive Guide on the conflicts in the galaxy, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
